body: Hello! If some of you noticed I have been inactive. I will be returning to the fourms, but not the server. I have pretty much quit Minecraft due to the ignorance of their company and other various reasons.

title: Return to the Community!

replies.body:
Welcome back, I noticed your inactivity. 

Good to have an old forum member back. ;)
